verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: surged] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-TMP: as the Trump Administration sought to calm a potential trade dispute with China . The dollar surrendered earlier gains and turned lower , Treasuries steadied , and traditional havens such as the yen and gold tumbled] .

U.S. stocks surged Monday as [ARG0: the Trump Administration] [V: sought] [ARG1: to calm a potential trade dispute with China] . The dollar surrendered earlier gains and turned lower , Treasuries steadied , and traditional havens such as the yen and gold tumbled .
